Out of the Box

Systems

In Out of the Box Systems we:

Overdelivery: work hard and do our best on 150%

Work is an important part of the lite of every member of our team. Tnis is one of the key principles that we use to recruit people to our team.

Trust each other and the customer

Trust always affects two outcomes — speed and cost. When trust is LOW the speed of doing business slows down and the cost goes up. Conversely, when trust is HIGH the speed of doing business accelerates and the cost falls. We use in our work the second model. In our view, trust is based on transparency.

Stick consistent approaches

We use the best practices in developing our products which include TDD principle. As you know the lifetime of the code without testing is one year. So, we agree that maintenance of software is cheaper than its  redevelopment. Also we use the best tools to solve problems.

Love to learn and share knowledge with each other and with society

We create connections between knowledge and people. We like studying and sharing our knowledge. That is why members of our team organize and participate in educational initiatives such as workshops, hackathons, webinars etc. Also we have created an online community where everyone who wants to get answers from our field is heard.

Help ecosystem and society when we can do it

We consider ourselves a part of the society that accepts a wider responsibility towards each other, the communities in which we operate, and the planet we all live on.

Think outside the box

We consider ourselves a part of the society that accepts a wider responsibility towards each other, the communities in which we operate, and the planet we all live on.
